questions.question: Match the model: Marguerite loved Mrs. Flowers, a sophisticated woman, whose education shaped her personality.

choices.answer: Joe owes Mr. Brown, a terrifying man, whose smile carried menace.
Joe owes money to Mr. Brown, the janitor, whose son is going to Harvard.

questions.question: Match the model: Burping into his face mask, Deegan disgusted himself and his classmates.

choices.answer: Falling downward, Alice tumbled down the rabbit hole, towards the sea.
Sighing in the wind, the old sailor felt the ocean and its memories.

questions.question: Match the model: Caleb ate fresh blueberries yesterday on the lawn.

choices.answer: Jacob fell toward the wall this afternoon after twirling around.
Sequoia built a bookshelf carefully in shop class.

questions.question: Exchange the ALL CAPS phrase:  AFTER WORKING AND RESPONDING TO EMAILS, Karen decided to watch Netflix.

choices.answer: Singing in the shower and crying
Before the kids came home from school
While focusing and studying for Spanish class
Until the end of the solar eclipse

questions.question: Exchange the ALL CAPS phrase: While waiting TO HEAR FROM HER PROFESSOR, Janie watched Netflix.

choices.answer: in line for a steak burrito
to shop with her sisters
to establish new policies with the governor
to flee to Rwanda with a stolen rhino

questions.question: Exchange the ALL CAPS phrase: Jill watched Netflix, ENJOYING THE INTERESTING DOCUMENTARIES AND INNOVATIVE PROGRAMS.

choices.answer: wearing yoga pants so she could do some light stretching
while she contemplated life in Indiana
her head propped up on a pillow on the couch
admiring plot points and unique characters
